help.title: Steam News help
help.description: **Steam News** is a bot that lets you follow Steam game news by sending community announcements, patch notes etc directly into a channel.

fields.name: How do I follow a game’s news/price?
fields.value: Add a watcher with `/watch`, remove it with `/unwatch`.

fields.name: How many games can I follow?
fields.value: By default, you can follow ${WATCH_LIMIT} news feeds and as many prices (which can be of different games). You can have an additional ${WATCH_VOTE_BONUS} news feeds and prices if you vote for us on Top.gg (link at the end of this message).

fields.name: The bot didn’t send the latest news at the second it came out!
fields.value: That is normal. It checks for news once an hour, so there can be up to an hour of delay.

fields.name: What about NSFW games?
fields.value: The bot will only send info and news about NSFW games in NSFW channels.

fields.name: Can I copy your bot?
fields.value:
Sure! It’s open sourced under the GNU GPL 3.0 licence.
Here is the Git repository: [${repository}](${repository})

fields.name: I still need help!
fields.value: That is unfortunate. You can come explain your issue on our support server: ${SUPPORT_SERVER}

fields.name: One last thing
fields.value: Like Steam News? Consider upvoting it on Top.gg: ${VOTE}
